post:
At [FixedRoute](http://www.fixedroute.com) we offer a dedicated IP VPN service in four locations: **New York City, Seattle, Atlanta and Australia**.

This means that rather than sharing your VPN IP address with a bunch of other people, you get an IP entirely for yourself, and can open up to five ports for use with the things you may wish to access outside of your home network.

Our service allows you to connect using OpenVPN, and we bundle a free license for the wonderful [Viscosity](https://www.sparklabs.com/viscosity/) software which you can use whilst you have services with FixedRoute.

**Our offer consists of 10TB/year bandwidth allowance in the three USA locations, and 5TB/year in Australia for just $10/year.**

>* **New York City - 10TB - $10/year - [ORDER](https://my.fixedroute.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=8&promocode=10YEARJULY)**
>* **Seattle - 10TB - $10/year - [ORDER](https://my.fixedroute.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=10&promocode=10YEARJULY)**
>* **Atlanta - 10TB - $10/year - [ORDER](https://my.fixedroute.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=13&promocode=10YEARJULY)**
>* **Australia - 5TB - $10/year - [ORDER](https://my.fixedroute.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=21&promocode=10YEARJULY)**


Thanks!

>* Visit our [website](http://www.fixedroute.com)
>* Follow us on [Twitter](http://twitter.com/fixedroutevpn)

_NOTE: This offer is not related to any other VPN services. I have approval from Maarten to post VPN offers._
